features: SAY IT WITH CAKE! Add a personalised message to your next special bake, with these fun, easy to use fondant letter stamps
EASY 3-STEP PROCESS: simply select the letters, place them in the holder, then press into icing to leave an imprint of your message
INCLUDES 73 FONDANT LETTER STAMPS: choose from millions of messages, from 'happy birthday', to 'congratulations', to 'merry Christmas'
WORKS ON CAKES AND MORE: with their petite design, these icing letters are ideal for small cakes, as well as cookies, biscuits and more
USEFUL INFO: these fun cake decorating tools are made of robust, food-safe plastic; they come boxed with a 12 month guarantee
description: From the manufacturer Have your cake and eat it With over 450 items, Sweetly Does It is all about making, decorating and serving the sweet things in life. So go cake crazy with cupcakes, cake pops, chocolates, macaroons and more. KitchenCraft Sweetly Does It Fondant Letter Stamps for Cake Decorating Make your cakes even sweeter with this cute, write-your-own-message kit. Cakes and cookies mean so much more when they carry a special message. So add your own, the easy way, with KitchenCraft Sweetly Does It’s cake letter stamps. Simply slide letters onto the holder to spell out your message, and then push firmly into cookie dough or fondant, to emboss the words in edible form! Why not bake a batch of ‘Merry Christmas’ cookies, treat a friend to a ‘Happy Birthday’ victoria sponge, or tempt partygoers with some ‘EAT ME’ cupcakes? The set contains 73 petite letter and number stamps, and is made from 100% food-safe plastic. Includes 73 letters and numbers, plus a message holder Hand-wash only Reasons to Love this Alphabet Cake Decorating Set A personal touch Personalise your cake decorations with a special message for family and friends, on birthdays and special occasions. Or why not give your cookies and cakes a seasonal feel at Christmas or Easter? Easy to use To apply your message simply add letters and numbers to the message holder, then press into the medium of your choice: cookie dough, fondant, icing or marzipan. About Sweetly Does It From wonderfully baked cakes to elaborately decorated sweet treats, Sweetly Does It from KitchenCraft has all the baking tools and decorating equipment to transform tasty treats into masterpieces for all to enjoy. So let your imagination run wild, and decorate, frost and glaze your sweet treats and baked goodies with Sweetly Does It’s extensive baking and decorating collection.
